OffenceType.name: Failure to segregate and store waste and handover segregated waste in accordance with the Rule (Residential)
Failure to segregate and store waste and handover segregated waste in accordance with the Rule (Marriage/ Party Halls, Festival Halls, Party Lawns, Exhibition and fairs)
Failure to segregate and store waste and handover segregated waste in accordance with the Rule (Clubs, Cinema Halls, Community Halls, Multiplexes and other such places)
Failure to segregate and store waste and handover segregated waste in accordance with the Rule (other non-residential entities)
Person littering waste on public places like road/ streets/ parks etc.
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas by household owner/ occupier OR Person dumping/ throwing/ littering on his private open plots or allowing the other to do so
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by shop owner
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by hotel/ restaurant owner
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by industrial establishment (non hazardous)
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by educational establishments
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by health establishments (non hazardous)
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by anyone establishment/ organization not covered in above
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by sweet shops
Waste dumping/ throwing/ littering in open areas/ public places by chat seller, fast food seller, ice-cream seller, sugarcane juice seller, vegetable seller, fruit seller etc.

Owner/head of the establishment from occupation mentioned at serial numbers 3 to 10 above, establishment if did not keep the separate disposal Bins for compostable and non-biodegradable wastes at his business place and spreading garbage in the public place
Littering road, public places, pathways, footpath etc. by hospitals, nursing homes, clinics, medical stores, laboratories etc. (non hazardous)
Quantity found/impounded upto 100 gram
Quantity found/impounded 101 - 500 gram
Quantity found/impounded 501 gram - 1 kilogram
Quantity found/impounded more than 1 Kg upto 5 kilogram
Quantity found/impounded more than 5 kilogram
